page.title: 05Godalming Leisure Centre
page.content: The swimming pool was started to be built in 1973 and was finished in 1974.It was opened to the public on August 1st 1974.It was designed by Ramsey Combes and Cooper and built by Bishop Pools from Berkshire.There are 12 people working there and 9 are trained lifeguards.They have a life saving club,subaqua club and swimming clubs.Schools often use the swimming pool for lessons.There are over 50,000 people who use the swimming pool a year.They can't build any new facilities because they haven't enough room.Squash used to be more popular than swimming but now the opposite is true.
